statements: DELETE FROM womens_education WHERE id = 100 AND scholarship_awarded = TRUE;
DELETE FROM womens_education WHERE education_level = 'Master' AND scholarship_amount > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM scholarships_awarded WHERE recipient_name = 'Alice' AND scholarship_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM women_educational_achievements WHERE level_of_education = 'PhD' AND id IN (SELECT id FROM women_educational_achievements WHERE achievement_description LIKE '%research%');
DELETE FROM scholarships_awarded WHERE year = 2022 AND amount < 5000;
DELETE FROM scholarships WHERE awarded_year < 2020 AND amount > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM education_progress WHERE student_id = 100 AND progress_percentage < 50;
DELETE FROM Scholarships WHERE id = 1 AND amount > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM WomenEducationalAchievements WHERE education_level = 'PhD' AND achievement LIKE '%research%';
